Desc.entry: An induction course is necessary before the facilities can be used. Facilities available free to members includes; fitness testing, health profile, programme run through and motivation techniques. Users must be aged 16 years or over. Children aged 11-15 years must be accompanied by a parent/guardian. Is an IFI accredited facility. Accepts slice cards.

ContactName.entry: Christine Green, Quality and Customer Service Manager/Yan Maychrzak

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-5pm (office times), Mon-Thurs 7am-9pm, Fri 7am-8.30pm, Sat & Sun 9am-5pm (fitness suite).
